price: ತ್ವಾ ಸೀನ್. ಇವು ಕುರ್‌ಆನ್‍ನ—ಸ್ಪಷ್ಟ ಗ್ರಂಥದ ವಚನಗಳಾಗಿವೆ.
arabic: طسٓۚ تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ وَكِتَابٖ مُّبِينٍ

version.title: Kannada translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Kannada language, translated by Muhammad Hamza Battur.

meta.transliteration: tta-seen til'ka āyātu al-qur'āni wakitābin mubīnin
